show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #91 Mindy Kain, Kain Meats
subtitle: #91 Mindy Kain, Kain Meats
summary:
Mindy Kain from Kain meats joins me on Zoom this week to talk about their beef program, their cattle and winning the Best Beef in the West buckle at the Rendevzous City beef roundup we talked about in episode 75

Mindy is a middle school teacher and she tells me about some of the programs in her school district they are trying to use to help children reconnect with the source of their food.
